item.title: Acrobat Boots
item.fluff: These enchanted boots enhance your acrobatic skills

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou stand up from prone.

item.title: Boots of Adept Charging
item.fluff: Rushing in is less dangerous in these studded leather boots

block.name: Property
block.line: After resolving a charge attack, you can shift 1 square.

item.title: Boots of Jaunting
item.fluff: These comfortable leather boots allow you to slip past obstacles unhindered

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport 1 square.

item.title: Boots of Stealth
item.fluff: The soft leather soles and down lining of these supple boots quiet your footsteps

item.title: Catstep Boots
item.fluff: These enchanted boots reduce falling damage and enhance your acrobatic and athletic skills

block.name: Property
block.line: You always land on your feet.
When you fall or jump down, you treat a fall of 40ft or less as being half the distance, and reduce a fall of more than 40ft as 20ft shorter.
Level 13100ft or less, or 50ft shorter
Level 23200ft or less, or 100ft shorter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to your next Acrobatics or Athletics check. You must make the check before the end of the encounter.
Level 13+4 power bonus
Level 23+6 power bonus

item.title: Feyleaf Sandals
item.fluff: This delicate footgear incorporates Feywild leaves into its design

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou start to fall
EffectYou teleport safely to the nearest horizontal surface within 5 squares that can supoort your weight.
You take no falling damage, and land on your feet.

item.title: Jester Shoes
item.fluff: These colourful, pointed shoes help you stand out -but not stand up- in a crowd

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are pushed, pulled, or slid
EffectReduce the distance of the pull, push or slide by 1 square.
Level 12by 2 squares
Level 22by 4 squares
If the forced movement was not reduced to 0, you fall prone after the triggering effect has been resolved.

item.title: Swiftpad Boots
item.fluff: These supple boots lend a lion's strength to your leaps

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to jump.
Level 13+6 item bonus.
Level 23+10 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou jump a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Level 23Equal to 1 + your Strength modifier.
If you are trained in Athletics, you jump 1 additional square.
